    • getDocuments

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getDocuments(org.bson.Document filter_doc, org.bson.Document search_doc, String collection, int count, int r_count, String order_key)
      Generic method to find a documents in a mongo collection with Pagination. By default, sort by creation time in descending
      Parameters:
      filter_doc - Filter options
      search_doc - Search/Projection options
      collection - MongoDb Collection name for this search
      count - page start count /page index
      r_count - the size of the page to be returned.
